Header: Troops Fight Against Wildfire atop Hantana
Content: 2 (V) Sri Lanka Sinha Regiment (SLSR) troops of the 111 Brigade HQ of 11 Division under the Security Force Headquarters - Central (SFHQ-Cen) on Monday (10) hurried to the Hantana mountain peak in the Uduwela Divisional Secretariat and extinguished a bushfire that was fast spreading. On the instructions and directions of Major General Laksiri Waduge, Commander, Security Forces - Central, and Commander, 111 Brigade coordinated the emergency operation and brought the fire under control. 1 Officer and 12 Other Ranks took part in this operation.
